name: AMID THE LINES
description:
Detective Northwood gets assigned by the FBI to investigate a chemical company for the suspicion of a terrorist attack on the city, but the company he is investigating belongs to one of the most important figures in the whole country.
But that won’t stop him , as he knows the risk is too high to begin worrying about politics.
He will break every bone and spill every drop of blood and kill if he has to ,to save the souls of innocent people.

-Dynamic combat.
-Fatality finishes.
-challenging gameplay.
-amazing graphics.
-realistic fighting moves.
